# Configuration for module: gucefGUI

set( HEADER_FILES 
)

set( SOURCE_FILES 
	src/main.cpp
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

# Set module name
set( MODULE_NAME "skatingtest" )


if(UDF_DEBUG STREQUAL yes)
	ADD_DEFINITIONS(-D_DEBUG=1)
endif()

# Set module link properties
add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} )
add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} udfskating )
target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} udfskating )
set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "DBTEST_BUILD_MODULE" )

# Add module include directories
include_directories(
	${UDF_SOURCE_DIR}/common/src 
	${UDF_SOURCE_DIR}/skating/src 
	${MYSQL_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${BOOST_INCLUDE_DIR}
)

# Add module find lib directories
link_directories ( ${UDF_BINARY_DIR}/lib ) 

# Add module link flags
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -Wall -L${UDF_BINARY_DIR}/lib") 


################################
## Add WxWidgets libs
################################

## platform dependent wxLibs
if ( WIN32 )
	include_directories( ${WX_BUILD_PATH}/lib/gcc_lib/mswu )
	
	link_directories ( ${WX_BUILD_PATH}/lib/gcc_lib ) 
	
	set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -L${WX_BUILD_PATH}/lib/gcc_lib") 
	
	include_directories( ../gui/src/windows )
	
	
else ( WIN32 )
	add_definitions(-pthread)
	
	set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -L${WX_BUILD_PATH}/lib") 
		
	include_directories( ../gui/src/linux )
	
	target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} 
		dl )
endif ( WIN32 )
